title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps in bug report 1GEWMOZ, specifically for the ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. The scripted resource editor example is the default editor for XML files
4. Open Navigator and select test.xml
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With...'
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'

The expected behavior is that a new editor should open for the file test.xml because the selected editor type is different. However, nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example remains active.
